Name: Radiant Stone
Des: Use Azte Ore to create Radiant Stone for Refine, which can refine earrings, necklaces, gauntlets, and shoes to enhance their performance.

recipeVariants.Name: Radiant Stone - Novice
recipeVariants.Des: Use Azte Ore to create Radiant Stone for Refine, which can refine earrings, necklaces, gauntlets, and shoes to enhance their performance.

SpecialAward.Name: Lucky Smelting Lv.1
SpecialAward.Des: 5% chance to gain an extra item when producing Mystery Metal, Radiant Stone, and Fine Forgestone.

SpecialAward.Name: Lucky Smelting Lv.2
SpecialAward.Des: 10% chance to gain an extra item when producing Mystery Metal, Radiant Stone, and Fine Forgestone.

SpecialAward.Name: Lucky Smelting Lv.3
SpecialAward.Des: 15% chance to gain an extra item when producing Mystery Metal, Radiant Stone, and Fine Forgestone.

materials.Name: Azte Ore
materials.Description: After smelting, it can be converted into Radiant Stones used for Refine.
materials.Description2: This ore is dark gray with a yellowish tint and a dim luster. The texture of the ore is relatively uniform, with no obvious flaws. Its moderate hardness makes it easy to cut and polish, which is precisely its charm.

lifeSkillSource.Name: Azte Ore
lifeSkillSource.Des: Low-grade Azte ore is commonly found near the Old Kanamia Tribe. While focused on gathering, you may harvest Azte Ore, which is used to craft Radiant Stone.

materials.Name: Burning Powder
materials.Description: A material that needs to be added during Forging .
materials.Description2: With its skill to significantly elevate temperature, this carbon powder ensures deeper and more efficient processing during smelting.

lifeSkillSource.Name: Burning Powder*15
lifeSkillSource.Des: With its skill to significantly elevate temperature, this carbon powder ensures deeper and more efficient processing during smelting.

SpecialAward.Name: Artisanry Lv.1
SpecialAward.Des: Gain 2 extra items when crafting Burning Powder or Gem Wax.

SpecialAward.Name: Artisanry Lv.2
SpecialAward.Des: Gain 5 extra items when crafting Burning Powder or Gem Wax. Gain 1 extra item when crafting Fast-Burning Powder.

materials.Name: Charcoal
materials.Description: Wood-fired products, primarily used as building materials.
materials.Description2: Though seemingly simple, the kiln process demands precision, especially in sealing!

lifeSkillSource.Name: Charcoal*10
lifeSkillSource.Des: Though seemingly simple, the kiln process demands precision, especially in sealing!

materials.Name: Pine Timber
materials.Description: A raw material that can be reprocessed by life professions.
materials.Description2: Available exclusively through merchants from alternative regions, as pine timber is protected in Asteria Plains.

recipeVariants.Name: Radiant Stone - Master
recipeVariants.Des: Producing Radiant Stone with Azte Rich Ore yields <style="accent-gn">higher expected output</style> compared to standard ore. It serves as a vital material for gear refinement, enhancing the performance of earrings, necklace, gauntlets, and shoes.

SpecialAward.Name: Lucky Smelting Lv.1
SpecialAward.Des: 5% chance to gain an extra item when producing Mystery Metal, Radiant Stone, and Fine Forgestone.

SpecialAward.Name: Lucky Smelting Lv.2
SpecialAward.Des: 10% chance to gain an extra item when producing Mystery Metal, Radiant Stone, and Fine Forgestone.

SpecialAward.Name: Lucky Smelting Lv.3
SpecialAward.Des: 15% chance to gain an extra item when producing Mystery Metal, Radiant Stone, and Fine Forgestone.

materials.Name: Azte Rich Ore
materials.Description: After smelting, it can be converted into a larger quantity of Radiant Stones used for Refine.
materials.Description2:
This ore is dark gray with a yellowish tint and a dim luster. The texture of the ore is relatively uniform, with no obvious flaws. Its moderate hardness makes it easy to cut and polish, which is precisely its charm..
Rich ores usually appear in clusters and have a much higher mineral content than ordinary raw stones, but their yield is lower, making them naturally more expensive.

lifeSkillSource.Name: Azte Rich Ore
lifeSkillSource.Des: Intermediate-grade Azte ore is commonly found on the floating isle at the center of the canyon. While focused on gathering, you may harvest Azte Rich Ore, which is used to craft Radiant Stone.

materials.Name: Burning Powder
materials.Description: A material that needs to be added during Forging .
materials.Description2: With its skill to significantly elevate temperature, this carbon powder ensures deeper and more efficient processing during smelting.

lifeSkillSource.Name: Burning Powder*15
lifeSkillSource.Des: With its skill to significantly elevate temperature, this carbon powder ensures deeper and more efficient processing during smelting.

SpecialAward.Name: Artisanry Lv.2
SpecialAward.Des: Gain 5 extra items when crafting Burning Powder or Gem Wax. Gain 1 extra item when crafting Fast-Burning Powder.

recipeVariants.Name: Radiant Stone - Master
recipeVariants.Des: Producing Radiant Stone with Azte Pure Ore yields <style="accent-gn">higher expected output</style> compared to standard ore. It serves as a vital material for gear refinement, enhancing the performance of earrings, necklace, gauntlets, and shoes.

SpecialAward.Des: 5% chance to gain an extra item when producing Mystery Metal, Radiant Stone, and Fine Forgestone.

materials.Name: Azte Pure Ore
materials.Description: After smelting, it can be converted into an even larger quantity of Radiant Stones used for Refine.
materials.Description2:
This ore is dark gray with a yellowish tint and a dim luster. The texture of the ore is relatively uniform, with no obvious flaws. Its moderate hardness makes it easy to cut and polish, which is precisely its charm.
High-precision ores usually appear in areas with high Engram concentration. Some refined ores will crystallize, having a much higher content than ordinary raw stones, making them very rare.

lifeSkillSource.Name: Azte Pure Ore
lifeSkillSource.Des: Rich Azte ore is commonly found on the north side of Rotgate Courtyard. While focused on gathering, you may harvest Azte Pure Ore, which is used to craft Radiant Stone.
